entry.title: Before Everything
entry.content:
Before Everything

JaneZ , 2025.1.21 , M Stand Coffee , Nanjing City

Well, hello world ! This is the owner of this crazy blog ! My name is JaneZ , a student from Shanghai Jiaotong
University . I major in Computer Science . I ‘m totally an E man , so I really want to know more people
with the same interests.
Why I start this blog ? Well , partly motivated by my high school classmate YXY , who major in
Artificial Intelligence in SJTU . I think it’s mainly because that after a whole semester learning in the
ACM class , I didn’t actually adapt to university life that well . So I hope to be more proactive in my learning
through this blog.
Any way , let’s get stated .
Attach a picture of this wonderful coffee shop !
![M Stand Coffee](/img/M Stand Coffee.png)
Can’t live without coffee …
